title: CSCL-Based Science Project Learning Design for Large-Scale Lecture Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Corporate scientific task competency enhancement program emphasizing collaborative problem-solving via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by engaging in three or more peer interactions using CSCL tools.
Learners demonstrate in-depth understanding of scientific topics by participating in online discussion forums at least twice a week.
Learners complete two collaborative projects developed in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) format, acquiring scientific analytical skills applicable to real-world tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
